attributes.additional_details: My cat was sadly run over by a speeding driver outside my house we are heartbroken. A cat is family thier lives matter so I would like the law to change so drivers must stop seek veterinary care and report to the police. I had been looking for my cat all day to sadly find her deceased should such law be in place she could have had a chance of survival also police could have informed me so I would not have had to not only go through the trauma of my cat missing but finding her deceased
attributes.background: Change the law on cats, drivers who hit cats need to be required by law to stop and seek urgent veterinary care for the injured cat or sadly deceased cat must be reported to police
